rules_text:
Pay 2 life: This creature gains deathtouch until end of turn. 
When this creature dies, you may pay discard a card. If you do, manifest dread. [i](Look at the top two cards of your library, then put one onto the battlefield face down as a 2/2 creature and the other into your graveyard. Turn it face up any time for its mana cost if it's a creature card.)[/i]
